overview.title: Overview
overview.content: READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE USING ANY KRAKEN SERVICE. THIS IS A LEGALLY BINDING AGREEMENT BETWEEN CUSTOMER (referred to herein as "Customer") AND KRAKEN.
overview.agreement: Kraken agrees to provide and furnish services to the Customer, subject to the following Terms of Service. Use of the Kraken service constitutes acceptance and agreement to our Terms of Service. We reserve the right to make changes to the provided Terms of Service as needed, without notice to our clients.

1.title: 1. Service Nature
1.content: KrakenHosting provides privacy-focused and jurisdictionally distributed hosting services. Server locations may vary across multiple countries, and infrastructure may change without prior notice. All Services are provided “as-is”, without warranties, and with the understanding that offshore hosting operates under different legal expectations than domestic hosting providers.

2.title: 2. Account Registration
2.content: To create an account, you must provide accurate and up-to-date information. We reserve the right to refuse service, request verification, or terminate accounts at our discretion. You are responsible for all activity conducted through your account.

3.title: 3. Acceptable Use Policy (AUP)
3.content: Customers must not use the Services for:
list: Child sexual abuse material (zero tolerance)
Malware, ransomware, botnets
Phishing, identity theft, or financial fraud schemes
Sending unsolicited bulk email (SPAM)
Activities that intentionally cause harm to networks or third parties
Hosting content illegal under universally recognized international standards
3.footer: Grey-area or high-risk content (IPTV, adult content, crypto services, privacy tools, proxies, etc.) is allowed as long as it does not violate the laws of the hosting jurisdiction and does not threaten infrastructure stability. We reserve the right to decide what constitutes abuse.

4.title: 4. Customer Responsibilities
list: The content you host
The security and configuration of your server
Maintaining backups
Ensuring compliance with all applicable laws relevant to your use
Responding to forwarded complaints
4.footer: KrakenHosting is not liable for data loss, misconfiguration, breaches caused by weak credentials, or failure to secure your environment.

5.title: 5. Payment Terms
list: Payments must be completed before service activation.
Late or missing payments result in automatic suspension.
We do not restore data from expired services.
Crypto payments are final and non-refundable due to blockchain immutability.
Refunds (if any) are given solely at KrakenHosting’s discretion.
5.footer: Chargebacks result in immediate account termination.

6.title: 6. Service Level Agreement (SLA)
list: Scheduled maintenance
External network outages
Cyberattacks (e.g., DDoS)
Force majeure events
Customer-caused configuration issues
6.footer: If uptime falls below SLA, customers may request service credits. Service credits are the sole remedy for downtime.

7.title: 7. Abuse & Notice Handling
7.content: KrakenHosting is an offshore provider. We do not automatically enforce foreign legal notices. However:
list: Valid complaints may be forwarded to the customer
Only complaints based on the hosting jurisdiction’s laws may require action
Repeated, severe abuse affecting network health can result in suspension
7.footer: KrakenHosting does not monitor customer content and is not liable for hosted material.

8.title: 8. Intellectual Property Rights
list: You retain ownership of all content you upload.
You grant KrakenHosting a non-exclusive license to store, transmit, and process data solely for delivering the Services.
KrakenHosting owns all operational software, backend systems, branding, infrastructure, and intellectual property related to the Service.

9.title: 9. Privacy & Data Protection
9.content: KrakenHosting follows strict internal privacy principles:
list: We do not sell customer data.
We do not monitor customer activity.
We do not retain logs unless required by the hosting jurisdiction.
We do not respond to foreign government requests unless legally required under applicable local law.
9.footer: For EU clients, KrakenHosting adheres to GDPR principles, but is not an EU-based entity. See our Privacy Policy for full details.

10.title: 10. Suspension & Termination
10.content: We may suspend or terminate service if:
list: Payments are late
AUP is violated
Repeated abuse complaints threaten operational stability
Fraudulent, false, or misleading information is provided
Activities present legal or technical risks
10.footer: No refund is provided in cases of violation or termination.

11.content: To the fullest extent permitted by international commercial standards:

  – Business interruption

  – Security breaches caused by user negligence

Our total liability is strictly limited to the amount paid by the customer in the last 12 months.

12.content: You agree to indemnify and hold KrakenHosting harmless against any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from:

13.content: We are not liable for delays or failures caused by circumstances outside our reasonable control, including:

Cyberattacks
Political instability
Power or global network failures

13.footer: Services may be partially or fully unavailable during such events.

14.title: 14. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution (International / Multi-Jurisdictional)
14.content:
This Agreement is governed by general principles of international commercial law and cross-border digital service norms. Because KrakenHosting operates servers in multiple jurisdictions, and because locations may change over time, no single national laws shall exclusively govern this Agreement.

Any dispute, claim, or controversy shall be resolved exclusively through binding arbitration, conducted:
list: In English
By a neutral arbitrator mutually agreed upon
Either remotely via secure online platform, or
At a mutually agreed physical location
14.footer: Arbitration decisions are final and binding. Class actions and group litigation are not permitted. Each party bears its own legal costs unless the arbitrator decides otherwise.
